alert.note: Alert for Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 1:55PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Stillwater, north central Carbon and southwestern Yellowstone Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 153 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Joliet, or 11 miles east of Columbus, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. Torrential rainfall limiting visibility. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laurel, Park City, Rockvale and Silesia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone
